document.full_text: the memorial day weekend is the unofficial kick-off for the summer tourism season in the colorado mountains, but this year visitors to the state's high country will encounter mid-winter snow conditions.
document.title: colorado mountains in grip of winter-like conditions
lines_and_colors: the memorial day weekend is the unofficial kick-off for the summer tourism season in the colorado mountains, but this year visitors to the state's high country will encounter mid-winter snow conditions.
